subject: p14353044
History: History of spinal lymphoma, evaluation for night sweats.
Findings: As compared to the previous radiograph, there is no relevant change. Status post spinal stabilization, left subclavian access line. Borderline size of the cardiac silhouette, elevation of the right hemidiaphragm with subsequent areas of atelectasis seen on both the frontal and the lateral radiograph. No newly appeared parenchymal opacities. No larger pleural effusions.
